issue.title: [Python] RowGroupMetaData.column misses bounds check
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5990](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5990). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`RowGroupMetaData.column` currently does not check for negative or too large positive indices, leading to an potential interpreter crash.
